alert.note: Alert for Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 29 at 9:25PM EST until January 30 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County. Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County. For the Dan River...including Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River at Paces. * WHEN...From late tonight to early tomorrow afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Monday the stage was 21.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.0 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 22.0 feet on 02/18/1998. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning at 930 AM EST.
